#ifndef UTILS_CPU_INFO_HH
#define UTILS_CPU_INFO_HH

#include <string>

namespace Utils {

  #ifndef DOXYGEN_SHOULD_SKIP_THIS
  using std::string;
  void cpuId( unsigned long CPUInfo[4], unsigned long l );
  #endif

  void
  info(
    bool & bMMX,
    bool & bMMXplus,
    bool & bSSE,
    bool & bSSE2,
    bool & bSSE3,
    bool & bSSSE3,
    bool & bSSE41,
    bool & bSSE42,
    bool & bSSE4a,
    bool & bSSE5,
    bool & b3Dnow,
    bool & b3DnowExt
  );

  bool has_MMX();
  bool has_MMXplus();
  bool has_SSE();
  bool has_SSE2();
  bool has_SSE3();
  bool has_SSSE3();
  bool has_SSE41();
  bool has_SSE42();
  bool has_SSE4a();
  bool has_SSE5();
  bool has_3Dnow();
  bool has_3DnowExt();

  string cpuInfo();
}

#endif
